alert.note: Alert for Culebra (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued May 25 at 12:16PM ADT until May 27 at 7:00AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM AST THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Dangerous rip currents expected due to breaking waves of 5 to 6 feet. * WHERE...Culebrita Beach. * WHEN...From 6 PM AST this evening through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
info.instruction: Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.
